Alarms Voice.tooltip: Which voice should the ship alarm use

Alarms Volume.tooltip: Volume at which the alarms will play

stallWarning.title: Enable Stall Warning
stallWarning.tooltip: Plays an alarm if the ship is falling and it's vertical speed is between 0 and 15 m/s

Overspeed Sensibility.tooltip: Starts an alarm if the ship speed is at 1/10th of the ship distance to target or higher. Minimum at 1/10, maximum at 2/10

Altitude Warning Distance.tooltip: When in overspeed, allows the altitude alarm to play at a set distance. Minimum at 1km, maximum at 5km

Sun Warning Distance.tooltip: At which distance from the sun should an alarm play. Minimum a 3km, maximum at 6km
